name: Crowned Heads - Four Kicks Capa Especial - Robusto
brand: Crowned Heads, Four Kicks Capa Especial
additionalNotes: The Crowned Heads Four Kicks Capa Especial is the fourth addition to the world famous Four Kicks line, which includes: Four Kicks, Four Kicks Maduro, and Four Kicks Mule Kick LE. Handmade at E.P. Carrilloâ€™s famed Tabacalera Alianza in the Dominican Republic, the Capa Especial sports an inviting natural Ecuadorian Sumatra-seed wrapper artfully draped over a Nicaraguan binder and a blend of Dominican and Nicaraguan tobaccos. This potent, yet balanced stick delivers rich notes of earth and spice underscored by a warm tobacco aroma. The Capa Especial is rolled using the intricate entubado method which creates a firm cigar and provides a flawless draw.
